posts.post_content:
Searching for a nice example for my type collection. Particularly interested in Collins/Baker, Bender, Brown, or Clarke. Prefer graded, 5 or possibly 6.

Thanks for looking.

Hey Paul - a bit out of left field but any chance you’re also looking for a T202?  I have a nice SGC 6 of Chance (with Shean).  Figured I’d toss it out there in case it was part of your hunt. 

Cheers,
Dan
Thanks, Dan. Just looking for T201 at the moment. Bought a nice T202 w/Speaker a few years ago on the B/S/T, so that particular base is covered.
